text: Tools of the Trade is an EP by British extreme metal band Carcass. It was released through Earache Records on 23 June 1992. ==Track listing== ==Other appearances== The EP is wholly contained on the compilation album Gods of Grind and the limited edition 2008 dualdisc reissue of Necroticism – Descanting the Insalubrious. It also appears on Wake up and Smell the... Carcass, but without the track "Incarnated Solvent Abuse". ==Personnel== *Michael Amott – guitar *Ken Owen – drums *Bill Steer – guitar, vocals *Jeff Walker – bass, vocals *Colin Richardson – production ==References== Category:Carcass (band) EPs Category:1991 EPs Category:Earache Records EPs
title: Tools of the Trade
